name: Association for Rural Development
briefDescription: Association for Rural Development (ARD) is a non-governmental organization registered under the Tamil Nadu Societies Act of 1975 in 1985. With the vision “empower the poor and marginalized – Transform Society” it was initiated by a group of committed social workers on seeing the injustice done to humanity particularly to female children and women and begun to work vigorously for the development and empowerment of needy, poor and poverty stricken people. ARD has been working for interior rural, urban slum and fishermen area intervention programme for social and economic self-autonomy with transformative approach. We are working in the backward districts such as Madurai, Theni and Ramanathapuram of Tamilnadu State.There are 140 staff in ARD
